text: @DanPatrick @StevieStacks84 Hey guys if you see this please read my go fund me page I’m having such a difficult time lost my job at the salon due to coronavirus actually was tested today and had the worst day of my life read my go fund me plz donate n share https://t.co/UkxEvNJP72 also have $LexieDroz  🤞❤️
